response.original_title: Don Juan: Sins Of The Flesh
response.overview: Don Juan: Sins of the Flesh picks up the epic saga of Don Juan after the world-famous lover has been cast into Hell. Escaping his fiery fate by sneaking into Purgatory, Don Juan (Ben Campezi) wanders the hallways of this surreal existence, sampling the homo-erotic treats that lie within. Complete with an orgy-fest finale where Alan Gregory, Antonio York, Mark Cirriano, and Luke Scott spray their hot loads on Don Juan before dragging him back down to the netherworld from which he escaped.
response.title: Don Juan: Sins Of The Flesh
